casebody.data:
Aaron Richard ESTES
v.
STATE. No. 28P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of January 2005 by Plaintiff for an order compelling the SBI to release any or all DNA/Toxicology Reports:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of February 2005."
